nl.naturalis.oaipmh.geneious

Class DocumentNotes

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.naturalis.oaipmh.geneious.DocumentNotes

  • public class DocumentNotes
extends Object
    A DocumentNotes instance maintains the values of all relevant notes within the document_xml column. The document_xml column may contain a <notes> element. The <notes> element contains one or more <note> elements. Each <note> element contains one child element whose name identifies the note, for example <BOLDIDCode_BOLD>. Not all of these child elements are relevant to the OAI-PMH generation process. Only those whose name corresponds to a DocumentNotes.Note constant are extracted from the XML.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DocumentNotes.Note
      Enumerates all XML elements that contain a note that might be used for OAI-PMH generation.
